settings.content:
Cassiopeia is a semi precious stone jewellery company who understands the fundamentals of what quality jewellery should be. By working hand in hand with our highly skilled silversmiths in Italy along with our mining sources of raw stones, we are able to show you a beautiful and mystical side of nature that you haven't seen before.

Our vast collection of 925 solid silver jewellery is meant to inspire women of all ages to feel even closer to nature, as nature intended. Don't worry gentlemen, we have manly and stylish selections for you as well.

Whether you're into crystal energy healing, horoscope astrology, birthstones, or simply intrigued by the science and history of stones, Cassiopeia is here to bring you one step closer to the natural world.

settings.faq_title: What forms of payment are acceptable?
settings.faq_content: After placing your order, you have the option to checkout as a guest or register for an account with us online. You can enjoy a quicker checkout procedure in the future and save your shipping and payment information by creating an online account. You will be able to access your account if you are an existing client. We accept the following for online purchases: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal. As soon as you place your order, your credit card or debit card will be charged.

settings.faq_title: CAN MY ORDER BE MODIFIED OR CANCELED?
settings.faq_content: You will only have a small window to change or cancel your purchase if the item is in stock, at whichpoint we prepare your order right away.Logging into My Account enables you to:o Reject your ordero Modify the delivery addresso Change the way you shipo Add, change, or remove a monogram or engravingIf your request was successful, we will let you know right away.
